title: Elon Musk Faces Criticism Over Deepfake Kamala Harris Video
content: Billionaire X owner ElonMuskwas facingcriticismMonday for sharing adeepfakevideofeaturing US Vice PresidentKamalaHarris, which tech campaigners said violated the platform's own policies.
summary: Billionaire X owner ElonMuskwas facingcriticismMonday for sharing adeepfakevideofeaturing US Vice PresidentKamalaHarris, which tech campaigners said violated the platform's own policies.

title: Quad Foreign Ministers Warn Of Terrorists Using New Technology
content: The Quad foreign ministers have reinforced their call for concerted international action against Pakistan-based Lashkar-e-Tayyiba (LeT), Jaish-e-Mohammad (JeM), as well as Al-Qa'ida and the Islamic State outfit.
summary: The Quad foreign ministers have reinforced their call for concerted international action against Pakistan-based Lashkar-e-Tayyiba (LeT), Jaish-e-Mohammad (JeM), as well as Al-Qa'ida and the Islamic State outfit.

title: Israel's Foreign Minister Calls On NATO To Expel Turkey
content: Israel's foreign minister on Monday called on NATO to expel Turkey as a member of the organization, in a move likely to further raise tensions between the countries.
summary: Israel's foreign minister on Monday called on NATO to expel Turkey as a member of the organization, in a move likely to further raise tensions between the countries.

title: Lebanon Airport Flights Cancelled Or Delayed Amid Israeli Attack Fears
content: Flights to and from Beirut airport were cancelled or delayed on Monday as tensions escalated between Israel and armed political group Hezbollah after a strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights killed 12 children and teenagers.
summary: Flights to and from Beirut airport were cancelled or delayed on Monday as tensions escalated between Israel and armed political group Hezbollah after a strike in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights killed 12 children and teenagers.

title: 2 Children Killed, 9 Injured In Knife Attack In UK, Say Cops
content: Two children have been killed and nine more injured, six critically, in a knife attack in northern England on Monday, police said.
summary: Two children have been killed and nine more injured, six critically, in a knife attack in northern England on Monday, police said.

title: Raging Park Fire Grows To California's 6th Largest Wildfire Ever
content: Thousands of firefighters battling a massive northern California wildfire were working in milder temperatures and higher humidity Monday, but the blaze that has destroyed more than 100 structures since it began five days ago continues to grow.
summary: Thousands of firefighters battling a massive northern California wildfire were working in milder temperatures and higher humidity Monday, but the blaze that has destroyed more than 100 structures since it began five days ago continues to grow.

title: Netanyahu Visits Golan Rocket Fire Site, Vows "Severe Response"
content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who on Monday visited the site of a deadly attack in the annexed Golan Heights, vowed Israel would deliver a "severe response" to the rocket fire that killed 12 children.
summary: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who on Monday visited the site of a deadly attack in the annexed Golan Heights, vowed Israel would deliver a "severe response" to the rocket fire that killed 12 children.

title: 8 Including Children Wounded In "Horrendous" England Knife Attack
content: A knife attack in northern England on Monday wounded at least eight people, reportedly including children, emergency services said.
summary: A knife attack in northern England on Monday wounded at least eight people, reportedly including children, emergency services said.

title: Trump Agrees To Meet With FBI For "Victim Interview" About Rally Shooting
content: Former US president Donald Trump has agreed to meet with the FBI for a "victim interview" about this month's assassination attempt, bureau officials said Monday.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump has agreed to meet with the FBI for a "victim interview" about this month's assassination attempt, bureau officials said Monday.

title: Trump Rally Shooter Was Spotted Over An Hour Before Shooting, Says FBI
content: Police noticed the Pennsylvania man who tried to assassinate Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump more than an hour before the July 13 shooting and took a photo to share with other law enforcement officers, an FBI official said on Monday.
summary: Police noticed the Pennsylvania man who tried to assassinate Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump more than an hour before the July 13 shooting and took a photo to share with other law enforcement officers, an FBI official said on Monday.

title: Iowa Becomes Latest US State To Adopt Near-Total Abortion Ban
content: After a year-long legal battle, Iowa became the latest US state to enact a near-total abortion ban on Monday, keeping the charged issue of reproductive rights at the forefront of November's presidential election.
summary: After a year-long legal battle, Iowa became the latest US state to enact a near-total abortion ban on Monday, keeping the charged issue of reproductive rights at the forefront of November's presidential election.

title: Ex-BBC Presenter Huw Edwards Charged With Indecent Child Picture Crimes
content: Former British TV news presenter Huw Edwards, a household name in Britain, has been charged with three counts of making indecent pictures of children, police said on Monday.
summary: Former British TV news presenter Huw Edwards, a household name in Britain, has been charged with three counts of making indecent pictures of children, police said on Monday.

title: Tourist's Skin Melts Off His Feet After Walking Barefoot In Death Valley
content: A 42-year-old Belgian tourist suffered third-degree burns after losing his flip-flops in the dunes of Death Valley.
summary: A 42-year-old Belgian tourist suffered third-degree burns after losing his flip-flops in the dunes of Death Valley.

title: Exercise Caution: Indian Embassy In Beirut Amid Israel-Hezbollah Conflict
content: Indian nationals currently in Lebanon and those planning to travel to the West Asian country are advised to "exercise caution," the Indian Embassy in Beirut said in an advisory issued on Monday.
summary: Indian nationals currently in Lebanon and those planning to travel to the West Asian country are advised to "exercise caution," the Indian Embassy in Beirut said in an advisory issued on Monday.

title: Opinion: India's Neglect Of Its Athletes Is Also An Olympic-Time Story
content: What should winning at the Olympics mean for Indians beyond the immediate photo ops? And what about the promised infrastructural and systemic reforms that would allow Indian children to even think of sports as a real choice?
summary: What should winning at the Olympics mean for Indians beyond the immediate photo ops? And what about the promised infrastructural and systemic reforms that would allow Indian children to even think of sports as a real choice?

title: Watch: Rafale Jets' "Bubble Of Protection" As Rocket Takes Off For Space
content: Europe's Ariane 6 rocket blasted off carrying satellites on July 9. The lift-off marked the return of Europe's access to outer space.
summary: Europe's Ariane 6 rocket blasted off carrying satellites on July 9. The lift-off marked the return of Europe's access to outer space.

title: Man Dies In Spain After Contracting 'Ebola-Like Disease' From Tick Bite
content: CCHF is transmitted through tick bites or contact with bodily fluids of infected animals or humans.
summary: CCHF is transmitted through tick bites or contact with bodily fluids of infected animals or humans.

title: "Will Not Be Intimidated" By Putin's Nuclear Weapon Threat: Germany
content: Germany said on Monday it was not deterred by Russian President Vladimir Putin's threats to relaunch production of intermediate-range nuclear weapons if the United States confirms its intention to deploy missiles to Europe.
summary: Germany said on Monday it was not deterred by Russian President Vladimir Putin's threats to relaunch production of intermediate-range nuclear weapons if the United States confirms its intention to deploy missiles to Europe.

title: India "Important Partner" When World At "Historic Turning Point": Japan
content: Calling India an "important partner" at a time when the world is at a "historic turning point", Japan on Monday said that it hopes to work more closely with the government led by Prime Minister Narendra Modi in the times to come.
summary: Calling India an "important partner" at a time when the world is at a "historic turning point", Japan on Monday said that it hopes to work more closely with the government led by Prime Minister Narendra Modi in the times to come.

title: "Solution Will Not Emerge From...": S Jaishankar On Russia-Ukraine War
content: Amid the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Monday said that the solution will not emerge from the battlefield, adding that it is imperative to return to dialogue and diplomacy.
summary: Amid the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Monday said that the solution will not emerge from the battlefield, adding that it is imperative to return to dialogue and diplomacy.
